column3: Includes $7.5 billion of goodwill and asset impairment charges related to Phone Hardware, as well as $2.5 billion of integration and restructuring expenses, primarily costs associated with our restructuring plans, which decreased fiscal year 2015 net income by $10.0 billion and diluted EPS by $1.15.

Includes a tax provision adjustment recorded in the fourth quarter of fiscal year 2014 related to adjustments to prior years' liabilities for intercompany transfer pricing which decreased net income by $458 million and diluted EPS by $0.05.
